member.name: IDesktopWindowXamlSourceNative2.PreTranslateMessage
member.summary: Enables the WinRT XAML framework to process a Windows message for a DesktopWindowXamlSource object that hosts a WinRT XAML control.
member.param: True if the message was processed; otherwise, false.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDesktopWindowXamlSourceNative2
member.summary: Provides a method that enables the WinRT XAML framework to process Windows messages for a DesktopWindowXamlSource object that hosts a WinRT XAML control.
